description: This file defines Express routes for a backend API, including endpoints for authentication, project management, user profile, and contact form. It also incorporates Swagger annotations for API documentation and middleware for authentication and rate limiting.

methods.name: router.post('/auth/login')
methods.description: Handles user login and returns JWT token.

methods.name: router.get('/auth/me')
methods.description: Retrieves the currently authenticated user information.

methods.name: router.get('/projects/:id')
methods.description: Gets details of a specific project by ID.

methods.name: router.post('/projects')
methods.description: Creates a new project (admin access required).

methods.name: router.put('/projects/:id')
methods.description: Updates an existing project by ID (admin access required).

methods.name: router.delete('/projects/:id')
methods.description: Deletes a project by ID (admin access required).

methods.name: router.put('/profile')
methods.description: Creates or updates the user profile (admin access required).

methods.name: router.post('/contact')
methods.description: Submits a contact message with rate limiting.
